title: Ronda Rousey will return to WWE "sooner rather than later" declares Triple H
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Ronda Rousey will return to WWE "sooner rather than later" according to the brands Chief Operating Officer Triple H.

Rousey has not been seen in the ring since March after her defeat at WrestleMania, as the 32-year-old took a break to start a family with husband and UFC star Travis Browne.

Speaking during the announcement of the Crown Jewel on pay-per-view, the former WWE world champion confirmed: "She's coming back."

However, the COO failed to provide a timetable for her return to SmackDown, adding that he expects that 'Rowdy' Ronda Rousey to be back in the squared-circle "sooner rather than later."

(Image: Twitter/WWE)

Previous reports suggested that the former UFC champion could re-enter the ring when SmackDown moved to the Fox network this month.

But, the 9-1-1 star suffered a setback when she almost severed her finger in an accident shooting a scene on the set of the TV drama series.

Rousey broke and almost sliced through a tendon in her middle finger and almost fractured her ring finger.

The former WWE champion, who plays a LA Fire Department officer on the show, slammed a door against her hand, but carried on filming.

And, after remarkably not breaking character, Rousey went to hospital in San Diego where she was treated for the gash with her finger almost hanging off.

Once at hospital Rousey had a metal plate and screw put in to treat the injury, before returning to work the next day.

Rousey's return to WWE action is hotly anticipated, with fans hoping for 'Rowdy' to renew her rivalry with Becky Lynch.

In-ring rival Lynch had previously said she would be ready if Rousey was to return.
description: Former UFC and WWE Women's champion has been out of the ring for seven months - since WrestleMania
